form.label: Rebuild Machine to Site Lookup File

html.p: The machine to site lookup table is named lookup_host_site.csv and correlates machines to XenDesktop sites. This is particularly helpful on the performance dashboards as the performance data gathered from Windows perfmon does not have a concept of a site. The same is true for information gathered from Windows Event Logs or any data that does not have a site concept.
To rebuild the machine to site lookup table, choose a time range above and click submit. You may need to choose a larger time range such as "Last 7 days".
